com.mygdx.game

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.mygdx.game.LevelObject
          • com.mygdx.game.Tile
            • com.mygdx.game.Interactable
              • com.mygdx.game.Button

  • public class Button
extends Interactable
    This class includes the methods and variables common to all button interactable objects (primarily used to open and close doors but also used to set levels)
